title: Mutiny on the Western Front
creator_credit: Richard Dennison, Brian Morris, Australian Film Commission and Mingara Films
brief_description: Australian veterans of the Great War revisit scenes of famous battles in France and Belgium. Tells the story of the Australian involvement using archival film and comment from war historians. Shows the change of attitude to war and the feelings that led some men in the Ist Battalion to mutiny in September 1918. Also reveals the public opinion and politics of the time.
